title: Sunday Worship
description:
Sunday worship at Eltham Green Community Church is a warm, welcoming time of worship and community.


People of all ages gather to sing, pray, and listen to the Bible, with teaching that is clear, practical, and connected to everyday life. Worship helps the church focus on Jesus and grow together in faith.


Children and young people are an important part of church life, with age appropriate groups running alongside the service when needed. After the service, many stay to talk over tea and coffee, building friendships and supporting one another through the week.
